触摸事件序列（QTouchEvent）的结束。

trans-unit.source: End users can interact with the rendered graph by using either the mouse or touch to rotate, zoom, or select data. Graphs can be rotated freely by holding down the right mouse button and moving the mouse. Zooming is done by rolling the mouse wheel. Selecting, if enabled, is done by pressing the left mouse button. The scene can be reset to the default camera view by clicking the mouse wheel. In touch devices, rotation is done by tap-and-move, selection by tap-and-hold, and zoom by pinch.
trans-unit.target: 终端用户可以通过使用鼠标或触摸来旋转、缩放或选择数据,与渲染的图形进行交互。通过按住鼠标右键并移动鼠标,可以自由旋转图形。缩放是通过滚动鼠标滚轮完成的。如果启用了选择功能,则可按鼠标左键进行选择。点击鼠标滚轮可以将场景重置为默认的摄像机视图。在触摸设备中,旋转是通过点击并移动来完成的,选择是通过点击并按住来完成的,缩放是通过捏住来完成的。

trans-unit.source: Engine-specific accessors, like getResource(), are however available only after the scenegraph is initialized. Additionally, there may be backend-specific limitations on when such functions can be called. The only way that is guaranteed to succeed is calling them when the rendering of a node (i.e. the preparation of the command list for the next frame) is active. In practice this typically means QSGRenderNode::render().
trans-unit.target: 但是，特定于引擎的访问器（如getResource（））仅在场景图初始化之后才可用。此外，在何时调用此类函数可能会有特定于后端的限制。保证成功的唯一方法是在激活节点渲染（即准备下一帧的命令列表）时调用它们。实际上，这通常意味着QSGRenderNode :: render（）。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the client libraries of the DBMS are available on the system. On Unix, run the command ldd and pass the name of the plugin as parameter, for example ldd libqsqlmysql.so. You will get a warning if any of the client libraries could not be found. On Windows, you can use Visual Studio's dependency walker. With Qt Creator, you can update the PATH environment variable in the Run section of the Project panel to include the path to the folder containing the client libraries.
trans-unit.target: 确保DBMS的客户端库在系统上可用。在Unix上，运行命令 ldd 并将插件名称作为参数传递，例如 ldd libqsqlmysql.so 。如果找不到任何客户端库，则会收到警告。在Windows上，可以使用Visual Studio的依赖项遍历器。使用Qt Creator，可以在“ 项目”面板的“运行”部分中更新 PATH 环境变量，以包含指向包含客户端库的文件夹的路径。

trans-unit.source: Even QML types themselves can be on the network - if the Prototyping with qmlscene is used to load http://example.com/mystuff/Hello.qml and that content refers to a type "World", the engine will load http://example.com/mystuff/qmldir and resolve the type just as it would for a local file. For example if the qmldir file contains the line "World World.qml", it will load http://example.com/mystuff/World.qml Any other resources that Hello.qml referred to, usually by a relative URL, would similarly be loaded from the network.
trans-unit.target: 甚至QML类型本身也可以在网络上-如果使用带有qmlscene的原型来加载 http://example.com/mystuff/Hello.qml ,并且该内容引用的是“世界”类型，则引擎将加载 http://example.com/mystuff/qmldir 并解析该类型，就像处理本地文件一样。例如，如果qmldir文件包含“ World World.qml”行，则它将加载 http://example.com/mystuff/World.qml Hello.qml 通常通过相对URL引用的任何其他资源将类似地从网络上加载。

Even though the templates aim to be as style-agnostic as possible, in some cases they have to make certain assumptions about the visual structure of a control. For example, a spinbox has buttons that increment and decrement the value of the spinbox. In order to implement the behavior of a spinbox, the spinbox template needs to know if the user is interacting with the up or down button. A visual implementation of the spinbox template merely needs to position the up and down buttons and visualize them in normal, pressed, and disabled states. Any input event handling and state processing is taken care of by the underlying template.
trans-unit.target: 尽管模板的目标是尽可能地与风格无关,但在某些情况下,它们必须对控件的视觉结构做出某些假设。例如,spinbox的按钮可以递增和递减spinbox的值。为了实现spinbox的行为,spinbox模板需要知道用户是在与向上还是向下按钮交互。旋盒模板的可视化实现只需要定位上、下按钮,并将其可视化为正常、按下和禁用状态。任何输入事件处理和状态处理都由底层模板负责。

trans-unit.source: Even though this kinetic scroller has a large number of settings available via QScrollerProperties, we recommend that you leave them all at their default, platform optimized values. Before changing them you can experiment with the plot example in the scroller examples directory.

trans-unit.source: Event data (_event.data) is implemented as a QVariant. If parameters are passed to <send>, the QVariant holds a QVariantMap, so multiple parameters with the same name are not supported.

trans-unit.source: Event driven objects may only be used in a single thread.

trans-unit.source: Event filters are supported in all threads, with the restriction that the monitoring object must live in the same thread as the monitored object. Similarly, QCoreApplication::sendEvent() (unlike postEvent()) can only be used to dispatch events to objects living in the thread from which the function is called.
trans-unit.target: 所有线程均支持事件过滤器，但限制是监视对象必须与被监视对象位于同一线程中。类似地，QCoreApplication :: sendEvent（）（不同于postEvent（））只能用于将事件调度到存在于调用该函数的线程中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Every QFont has a key() which you can use, for example, as the key in a cache or dictionary. If you want to store a user's font preferences you could use QSettings, writing the font information with toString() and reading it back with fromString(). The operator<<() and operator>>() functions are also available, but they work on a data stream.

trans-unit.source: Every QFont has a key() which you can use, for example, as the key in a cache or dictionary. If you want to store a user's font preferences you could use QSettings, writing the font information with toString() and reading it back with fromString(). The operator<<() and operator>>() functions are also available, but they work on a data stream.

Every attempt is made to read or write the value of a descriptor or characteristic on the hardware. This means that meta information such as QLowEnergyCharacteristic::properties() is generally ignored when reading and writing. As an example, it is possible to call writeCharacteristic() despite the characteristic being read-only based on its meta data description. The resulting write request is forwarded to the connected device and it is up to the device to respond to the potentially invalid request. In this case the result is the emission of the CharacteristicWriteError in response to the returned device error. This behavior simplifies interaction with devices which report wrong meta information. If it was not possible to forward the request to the remote device the OperationError is set. A potential reason could be that the to-be-written characteristic object does not even belong the current service. In summary, the two types of errors permit a quick distinction of local and remote error cases.
trans-unit.target: 尝试读取或写入硬件上的描述符或特性的值。这意味着在读写时通常会忽略诸如QLowEnergyCharacteristic :: properties（）之类的元信息。作为示例，尽管特征基于其元数据描述是只读的，也可以调用writeCharacteristic（）。生成的写请求将转发到连接的设备，然后由设备来响应可能无效的请求。在这种情况下，结果是CharacteristicWriteError的发出响应返回的设备错误。此行为简化了与报告错误元信息的设备的交互。如果无法将请求转发到远程设备，则会设置OperationError。潜在的原因可能是要写入的特征对象甚至不属于当前服务。总之，这两种类型的错误可以快速区分本地和远程错误案例。

trans-unit.source: Every call from CLR bytecode to native code implies a small performance hit, and necessary type conversions introduce an additional delay with every layer that exists between the two frameworks. Consequently every approach to mix .NET and native code should try to minimize the communication necessary between the different worlds.
trans-unit.target: 从CLR字节码到本地代码的每一次调用都意味着一个小的性能冲击,而且必要的类型转换会给两个框架之间的每一层带来额外的延迟。因此,每一种混合.NET和本地代码的方法都应该尽量减少不同世界之间的必要通信。

trans-unit.source: Every child of this node that has the flag QSGNode::OwnedByParent set, will also be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 设置了标志QSGNode :: OwnedByParent的该节点的每个子节点也将被删除。

trans-unit.source: Every connection you make emits a signal, so duplicate connections emit two signals. You can break a connection using disconnect().
trans-unit.target: 您建立的每个连接都会发出一个信号，因此重复的连接会发出两个信号。您可以使用断开连接（）断开连接。

trans-unit.source: Every dependency that is a result of .depend_command is checked for existence. Non-existing dependencies are ignored. This value was introduced in Qt 5.13.2.

Every element that the user needs to interact with or react to is an accessible object, and should provide this information. These are mainly visual objects, such as widgets and widget elements, but can also be content, such as sounds.
trans-unit.target: 每一个用户需要与之交互或做出反应的元素都是可访问对象,应该提供这些信息。这些对象主要是视觉对象,如小组件和小组件元素,但也可以是内容,如声音。

trans-unit.source: Every event contains an accept flag that indicates whether the receiver wants the event. You should call QTabletEvent::accept() if you handle the tablet event; otherwise it will be sent to the parent widget. The exception are TabletEnterProximity and TabletLeaveProximity events: these are only sent to QApplication and do not check whether or not they are accepted.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件都包含一个接受标志，该标志指示接收方是否想要该事件。如果您处理平板电脑事件，则应该调用QTabletEvent :: accept（）；否则它将被发送到父窗口小部件。TabletEnterProximity和TabletLeaveProximity事件是一个例外：它们仅发送到QApplication，并且不检查它们是否被接受。

trans-unit.source: Every filter section should have filter attributes assigned to it, to enable documentation filtering. If no filter attribute is defined, the documentation will only be shown if no filtering occurs, meaning the current custom filter in the QHelpEngine does not contain any filter attributes.
trans-unit.target: 每个过滤器部分应分配有过滤器属性，以启用文档过滤。如果未定义任何过滤器属性，则仅当未进行过滤时才会显示文档，这意味着QHelpEngine中的当前自定义过滤器不包含任何过滤器属性。

trans-unit.source: Every instance of the QAxScript class represents a piece of scripting code in a particular scripting language. The code is loaded into the script engine using load(). Functions declared in the code can be called using call().
trans-unit.target: QAxScript类的每个实例都代表一种使用特定脚本语言的脚本代码。使用load（）将代码加载到脚本引擎中。代码中声明的函数可以使用call（）进行调用。

trans-unit.source: Every instance of the QAxScriptEngine class represents an interpreter for script code in a particular scripting language. The class is usually not used directly. The QAxScript and QAxScriptManager classes provide convenient functions to handle and call script code.
trans-unit.target: QAxScriptEngine类的每个实例都代表一种特定脚本语言的脚本代码解释器。该类通常不直接使用。该QAxScript和QAxScriptManager类提供方便的功能来处理和呼叫脚本代码。

trans-unit.source: Every instance of the QAxScript class represents a piece of scripting code in a particular scripting language. The code is loaded into the script engine using load(). Functions declared in the code can be called using call().

Every instance of the QAxScriptEngine class represents an interpreter for script code in a particular scripting language. The class is usually not used directly. The QAxScript and QAxScriptManager classes provide convenient functions to handle and call script code.

Every item of data that can be accessed via a model has an associated model index. You can obtain this model index using the index() function. Each index may have a sibling() index; child items have a parent() index.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过模型访问的每个数据项都有一个关联的模型索引。您可以使用index（）函数获得该模型索引。每个索引可以具有一个sibling（）索引；子项具有父（）索引。

trans-unit.source: Every logical particle is a member of a particle group, and each group is identified by a name. If no other group has been specified, a logical particle belongs to the group with the name "" (the empty string), which acts the same as any other group. Groups are used for two purposes, for controlling particles and because they can have stochastic state transitions.
trans-unit.target: 每个逻辑粒子都是一个粒子组的成员,每个组都有一个名称。如果没有指定其他组,逻辑粒子属于名称为""(空字符串)的组,它的作用与其他组相同。组有两个用途,一是用于控制粒子,二是由于它们可以有随机的状态转换。

trans-unit.source: Every object has an objectName() and its class name can be found via the corresponding metaObject() (see QMetaObject::className()). You can determine whether the object's class inherits another class in the QObject inheritance hierarchy by using the inherits() function.
trans-unit.target: 每个对象都有一个objectName（），并且可以通过相应的metaObject（）找到其类名（请参见QMetaObject :: className（））。您可以通过使用继承（）函数来确定对象的类是否继承QObject继承层次结构中的另一个类。

trans-unit.source: Every time the current index changes, each widget is updated with data from the model via the property specified when its mapping was made. If the user edits the contents of a widget, the changes are read using the same property and written back to the model. By default, each widget's user property is used to transfer data between the model and the widget. Since Qt 4.3, an additional addMapping() function enables a named property to be used instead of the default user property.
trans-unit.target: 每次当前索引更改时，每个小部件都会通过进行映射时指定的属性使用来自模型的数据进行更新。如果用户编辑窗口小部件的内容，则使用相同的属性读取更改并将其写回到模型中。默认情况下，每个小部件的用户属性用于在模型和小部件之间传输数据。从Qt 4.3开始，附加的addMapping（）函数允许使用命名属性代替默认的用户属性。

trans-unit.source: Every time the source or effect properties are changed, the pixels in the cache must be updated. Memory consumption is increased, because an extra buffer of memory is required for storing the effect output.
trans-unit.target: 每次改变源或效果属性时,必须更新缓存中的像素。由于需要额外的内存缓冲区来存储效果输出,因此内存消耗会增加。

trans-unit.source: Extensibility is the ability to show the dialog in two ways: a partial dialog that shows the most commonly used options, and a full dialog that shows all the options. Typically an extensible dialog will initially appear as a partial dialog, but with a More toggle button. If the user presses the More button down, the dialog is expanded. The Extension Example shows how to achieve extensible dialogs using Qt.
trans-unit.target: 可扩展性是通过两种方式显示对话框的能力：显示最常用选项的部分对话框，以及显示所有选项的完整对话框。通常，可扩展对话框最初将显示为部分对话框，但带有“ 更多”切换按钮。如果用户按下“ 更多”按钮，则对话框将展开。该扩展示例显示了如何实现使用Qt扩展对话框。

trans-unit.source: Extra care has to be taken to avoid using the framebuffer when the GUI/main thread is performing compositing. The signals aboutToCompose() and frameSwapped() will be emitted when the composition is starting and ending. They are emitted on the GUI/main thread. This means that by using a direct connection aboutToCompose() can block the GUI/main thread until the worker thread has finished its rendering. After that, the worker thread must perform no further rendering until the frameSwapped() signal is emitted. If this is not acceptable, the worker thread has to implement a double buffering mechanism. This involves drawing using an alternative render target, that is fully controlled by the thread, e.g. an additional framebuffer object, and blitting to the QOpenGLWidget's framebuffer at a suitable time.
trans-unit.target: 当GUI /主线程执行合成时，必须格外小心以避免使用帧缓冲区。合成开始和结束时将发出aboutToCompose（）和frameSwapped（）信号。它们在GUI /主线程上发出。这意味着通过使用直接连接aboutToCompose（）可以阻止GUI /主线程，直到工作线程完成其渲染为止。之后，工作线程必须不执行任何进一步的渲染，直到frameSwapped（）信号被发射。如果这是不可接受的，则工作线程必须实现双缓冲机制。这涉及使用由线程完全控制的替代渲染目标（例如，额外的帧缓冲区对象）进行绘制，并在适当的时候使用BGL渲染到QOpenGLWidget的帧缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Extra care has to be taken to avoid using the framebuffer when the GUI/main thread is performing compositing. The signals aboutToCompose() and frameSwapped() will be emitted when the composition is starting and ending. They are emitted on the GUI/main thread. This means that by using a direct connection aboutToCompose() can block the GUI/main thread until the worker thread has finished its rendering. After that, the worker thread must perform no further rendering until the frameSwapped() signal is emitted. If this is not acceptable, the worker thread has to implement a double buffering mechanism. This involves drawing using an alternative render target, that is fully controlled by the thread, e.g. an additional framebuffer object, and blitting to the QOpenGLWidget's framebuffer at a suitable time.
